name: 00_LR
description:
INTERFERENCE DETECTED
FA██SA██ INI██████

Oh no!  The Batter finds himself off-course from his most important mission!
Will you help him get back on track?

A game with...

  • Places!
  • People!
  • Violence and language possibly unsuitable for children!
  • Endings!

Try it or else THIS little guy gets it ⇾"pwease! they have my famiwy!"

A fangame based on the game "OFF" by the talented Mortis Ghost.
